ModMetaData.name: AdvancedGeneProcessor单格先进基因处理器
ModMetaData.author: 幽月琉璃Luna
ModMetaData.description: 先进基因处理器mod，添加了一种占地仅单格、复杂度提升更大的高级机械超频仪，需要极致机械族科技解锁 [*]Added an advanced gene processor on a 1×1 cell. [*]The advanced mech booster has genetic complexity increase of 3 (2 in the original) and needs to be unlocked by researching UltraMechtech. [*]If you have Save Our Ship 2 installed, the machine will consume Exotic Particles to build, but the genetic complexity increase becomes 6. 在同时安装SOS2后将得到再一次强化。
